name: Mine
description: Mines nearby ores, increasing your resources

name: Laser mine
description: Only mines its own tile, but faster and more consistently

name: Deep laser mine
description: Mines faster, and additionally mines iron

name: Core laser mine
description: Mines insane amounts of iron. Breaks <TODO> towers

name: Bigger bomb mine
description: Mines larger yields and radius but slower

name: Larger radius
description: Mines a bigger radius, but less ore

name: Fracking mine
description: Mines an even larger radius, but degrades buildings in the mining zone

name: Super fracking mine
description: Mines a huge radius, but degrades every tower
